original_title: Former All Black and Kandy SC Coach Bruce Robertson no more
original_body_lines: Former All Blacks Centre and Kandy Sports Club Head Coach of the 2005 outfit, Bruce Robertson passed away after brief illness in New Zealand recently.
Robertson played for New Zealand during 1970 to 80’s in 34 Test matches. He was the Head Coach of the Kandy SC in 2005 when Sanjeewa Jayasinghe led the outfit. By Shamseer Jaleel
